com.persistit.mxbeans

Interface CleanupManagerMXBean


  • @MXBean
public interface CleanupManagerMXBean
    Management information about the CLEANUP_MANAGER, a thread that performs background pruning and other cleanup tasks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MXBEAN_NAME 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clear the queue of all pending CleanupAction.
      long getAcceptedCount() 
      long getEnqueuedCount() 
      long getErrorCount() 
      long getMinimumPruningDelay() 
      long getPerformedCount() 
      long getPollInterval() 
      long getRefusedCount() 
      void poll()
      If there are any enqueued CleanupActions, take some of them from the queue and attempt to complete them.
      void setMinimumPruningDelay(long delay)
      Set the minimum interval in milliseconds between attempts to enqueue a page needing to be pruned.
      void setPollInterval(long interval)
      Set the interval in milliseconds between cleanup polling actions

    • Field Detail

      • MXBEAN_NAME

        static final String MXBEAN_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getAcceptedCount

        long getAcceptedCount()
        Returns:
        the number of CleanupActions enqueued since Persistit started.

      • getRefusedCount

        long getRefusedCount()
        Returns:
        the number of CleanupActions rejected due to a full CleanupManager queue since Persistit started.

      • getPerformedCount

        long getPerformedCount()
        Returns:
        the number of CleanupActions successfully completed since Persistit started.

      • getErrorCount

        long getErrorCount()
        Returns:
        the number of CleanupActions that failed due to errors since Persistit started.

      • getEnqueuedCount

        long getEnqueuedCount()
        Returns:
        the number of CleanupActions currently enqueued.

      • poll

        void poll()
          throws Exception
        If there are any enqueued CleanupActions, take some of them from the queue and attempt to complete them.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clear the queue of all pending CleanupAction. This should be done only with knowledge and care.

      • getPollInterval

        long getPollInterval()
        Returns:
        The interval in milliseconds between cleanup polling actions

      • setPollInterval

        void setPollInterval(long interval)
        Set the interval in milliseconds between cleanup polling actions
        Parameters:
        interval - the interval

      • getMinimumPruningDelay

        long getMinimumPruningDelay()
        Returns:
        The minimum interval in milliseconds between attempts to enqueue a page needing to be pruned.

      • setMinimumPruningDelay

        void setMinimumPruningDelay(long delay)
        Set the minimum interval in milliseconds between attempts to enqueue a page needing to be pruned.
        Parameters:
        delay -
